document.masterDocTitle: Checklist of the Iranian Ground Beetles (Coleoptera; Carabidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Checklist of the Iranian Ground Beetles (Coleoptera; Carabidae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Elaphropus ( Elaphropus ) caraboides Motschulsky, 1839 Citations
: Without exact locality (
Kopeck√Ω, 2003
).

=
Tachyphanes Jeannel, 1946
Studied material: Razavi Khorasan, Mazandaran and North Khorasan Provinces (leg. J. Frisch, coll. Of the Museum of Berlin).
Studied material: Fars Province; ( ZMTU ): Aghasht and Kondor (Prov. of Tehran). Citations: North of Iran , Elburz Mts. R. (Dobler, 1975 ).

Studied material: Kerman, Hormozgan, Razavi Khorasan, Mazandaran, Esfahan, North Khorasan, Fars and West Azarbaijan Provinces (leg. J. Frisch, coll. Of the Museum of Berlin); ( ZMTU ): Kordak, 2008 (Prov. of Qazvin) and Kondor, 2008 (Prov. of Tehran).
Studied material: Golestan, Kerman, Esfahan, Mazandaran, Fars and West Azarbaijan Provinces (leg. J. Frisch, coll. Of the Museum of Berlin).

=
inaequalis (Kolenati, 1845 )

bibRefCitation.author: Coulon
bibRefCitation.refString: Coulon, J. (2011) Les Tachys du groupe scutellaris d'Europe occidentale et d'Afrique du Nord, et notes taxonomiques sur quelques autres especes de Tachys (Coleoptera, Trechidae, Tachyini). Bulletin de la Societe Entomologique de France, 116 (3), 303 - 320.

subSubSection.paragraph: Citations: 9 km South west of Hajiabad, 840 m ; 6 km North east of Tall-e Gerdu, 880 m ; Hajiabad, Dar agah, 1110 m (Prov. of Hormozgan; Felix, 2011 ).

Studied material: Razavi Khorasan, Hormozgan, Kerman, Kermanshah, Fars , Yazd, North Khorasan, Semnan, Golestan, West Azarbaijan (leg. J. Frisch, coll. Of the Museum of Berlin); ( ZMTU ): Khane Zenian, 2010 (Prov. of Fars ) and Neyzar, 2012 (Prov. of Qom).

Elaphropus ( Tachyura ) lucasi
(Jacquelin du Val, 1852 )

Elaphropus ( Tachyura ) parvula (Dejean, 1831 ) Studied
material: ( ZMTU ): Qalat village, 2012 (Prov. of Fars ). Citations:
New record for Iran .
Studied material: North Khorasan, Razavi Khorasan, Hormozgan, Kerman and Fars (leg. J. Frisch, coll. Of the Museum of Berlin).

Studied material: Yazd, Esfahan, Razavi Khorasan, Tehran, Chahar Mahal va Bakhtiari, Kerman, Fars , Esfahan, Hormozgan, Kordestan, West Azarbaijan and Zanjan Provinces (leg. J. Frisch, coll. Of the Museum of Berlin); ( ZMTU ): Shahrekord, 2240 m (Prov. of Chahar Mahal va Bakhtiari).

Elaphropus ( Sphaerotachys ) hoemorroidalis (Ponza, 1805 ) Studied
material: Kerman, Esfahan, Fars , Kermanshah, Hormozgan, Kordestan and West Azarbaijan (leg. J. Frisch, coll. Of the Museum of Berlin); ( ZMTU ): Najmaabad, 1200 m (Prov. of Tehran).
